title: Ren'ai Choukyou - Host Yuugi
sinopse: At first glance, Shindo appears to be a serious and outstanding student but when he takes off his glasses, he becomes an attractive nightclub host! Although Mei is used to seeing handsome men at her parents' host club, she is attracted to Shindo's irresistible charm and sexy foul tactics. (Source: M-U)
